page.title: 12GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: {WESTHAM} At school we play Westham. You normally play with four people. One person is in the net and the rest are outside. The netter starts with ten points and the rest have nine. You have to volley the ball into the net. If it's not a volley you lose a point and go in the net. This carries on until one of the players gets down to 0 points. {DANISH LONGBALL} This is a good game but tiring. It is a team game. A bowling and a batting captain are picked. The batting team bats first and the other team fields. The first batter hits the ball with their hand and runs to the other end of the pitch. If they hit the ball far enough they can run back to score two points. You are out if you are caught, stumped or hit by the ball
